text:
From The Three Khans To Newly-Weds DeepVeer, B-Town Had A Gala Time At Isha Ambani's Sangeet
From The Three Khans To Newly-Weds DeepVeer, B-Town Had A Gala Time At Isha Ambani's Sangeet
We might have missed all the fun and frolic that was going on in Umaid Bhawan and Italy’s Lake Como during Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas and Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh’s wedding. But, we sure have glimpses – a lot of snippets – from Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal’s wedding in Udaipur.
The entire Bollywood clan was present at the pre-wedding festivities that took place last night. From Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan and Aamir Khan to the Bachchans and newly-weds DeepVeer and Nickyanka, the B-town clan pretty much brought the house down with their performances.
Want to know what happened inside Udaipur’s Udaivilas last night? Here’s the sneak peek!
#1 Shah Rukh Khan performed with wife Gauri and it all started with a kiss.
#2 Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai stole the thunder as they danced to the popular track from Guru. Love was in the air!
#3 Salman was seen dancing to Shah Rukh’s Koi Mil Gaya!
Don't Miss 365 SHARES 161 SHARES 812 SHARES 183 SHARES 1 K SHARES
#4 SRK and Aamir set the stage on fire with their energetic dance moves.
#5 King Khan brought the entire Ambani clan on stage for a ‘Shava Shava’ performance.
#6 Ranveer-Deepika also rocked the dance floor!
#7 Karan Johar also shook a leg!
#8 It was a night to remember!

title: From The Three Khans To Newly-Weds DeepVeer, B-Town Had A Gala Time At Isha Ambani's Sangeet
description: The entire Bollywood clan was present at the pre-wedding festivities of Isha Amabani and Anand Piramal’s wedding in Udaipur that took place last night. From Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan and Aamir Khan to the Bachchans and newly-weds DeepVeer and Nickyanka, the B-town clan pretty much brought the house down with their performances.
